thread.title: Cruise opens up a whole new world for Lisa
thread.title_full: Cruise opens up a whole new world for Lisa

title: Cruise opens up a whole new world for Lisa
text:
Cruise opens up a whole new world for Lisa 13th Jul 2015 12:00 AM Local Real Estate Cars For Sale 
FOR self-confessed cruise expert Lisa Noye from Flight Centre Toowoomba, a recent trip to New York opened up a whole new world on the high seas. 
"My mother and I were travelling around that side of the world, but we wanted to see more in the short amount of time we had, so we booked a Princess Cruise around the east coast of Canada." 
When Lisa wasn't ashore exploring destinations like Halifax and Nova Scotia, she simply relaxed, played bingo, went to the movies and enjoyed the evening shows. 
"Princess Cruises is definitely for an older market or younger people who aren't looking to party," she said. 
"I definitely encourage my clients to book a cruise. Like people say, you really only have to unpack once, plus you've got the flexibility to do what you want, when you want. You don't have to be up and on the road at the crack of dawn like with a bus tour. Not to mention the service and food are absolutely incredible." 
When it comes to trending cruise destinations, Lisa is finding more of her clients are prepared to venture away from South Pacific, and Asia is leading the way. 
For your next holiday call Flight Centre on 1300 499 787. cruise
